name: Hanoi Dai Duong Hotel 2
address: No 28 Nguyen Khang, Cau Giay, Ha Noi & No 33 Alley 34 Nguyen Thi Dinh,, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering quality accommodations in the shopping, business, restaurants district of Hanoi, Hanoi Dai Duong Hotel 2 is a popular pick for both business and leisure travelers. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Hanoi Dai Duong Hotel 2 also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Hanoi. Guests of the hotel can enjoy on-site features like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, laundry service.

Guests can choose from 15 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Hanoi Dai Duong Hotel 2 is your one-stop destination for quality hotel accommodations in Hanoi.

places.name: Trung Tam Y Te Du Phong Ha Noi
